txt.en:
'Greetings! There is an expedition planned deep under the mountains. The great cooks of Thorin's Hall have called for the forges of Ukhbab-gairu to be fired to bake the precious meal. No, we are not sharing the recipes. However, we are awarding anyone who assists in the efforts.

'If you are able then there is a manner in which you can assist us.

'I can inform you of the tasks necessary to complete the undertaking here at Thorin's Hall.'
